Title: blockNumber
Description:
Returns a monotonically increasing sequence number of the block containing the row.
The returned block number is updated on a best-effort basis, i.e. it may not be fully accurate.
Sequence number of the data block where the row is located. UInt64.
Examples: SELECT blockNumber()FROM(    SELECT *    FROM system.numbers    LIMIT 10) SETTINGS max_block_size = 2
